scripts.setup:local: cp config/parameters.example.json config/parameters.json && echo 'âœ… Edit config/parameters.json with your values'
scripts.local:dev: npm run generate:env dev && npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --env-vars env.json --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.local:prod: npm run generate:env prod && npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --env-vars env.json --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev:setup: npm run generate:env dev && npm run setup:aws dev && npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:prod:setup: npm run generate:env prod && npm run setup:aws prod && npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
